properties.entry: INSERT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#insertMember() */ INTO MEM_INFO A ( MEM_NUM , MEM_NAME , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_BIRTHDATE , MEM_WITHDRAW_DATE , MEM_CLASS , MEM_BLOCK_DATE , MEM_ENROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , NULL , '회원' , NULL , SYSDATE )
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#idCheck() */ A.MEM_ID FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ A.MEM_NUM , A.MEM_NAME , A.MEM_ID , A.MEM_PWD , A.MEM_EMAIL , A.MEM_ADDRESS , A.MEM_BIRTHDATE , A.MEM_LOGIN_COUNT , A.MEM_COIN , A.MEM_CAN_VOTE_YN , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_DATE , A.MEM_CLASS , A.MEM_BLOCK_YN , A.MEM_BLOCK_DATE , A.MEM_ENROLL_DATE , A.MEM_WEEKLY_COIN_YN FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN = 'N' AND A.MEM_ID = ?
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptedPwd() */ A.MEM_PWD FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN = 'N' AND A.MEM_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectUseCoin() */ A.COIN_USE_NUM , A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.MEM_NUM , A.COIN_USE_DATE , A.COIN_USAGE , A.CHAPTER_NUM , C.CATEGORY_CODE , C.WEB_NOV_TITLE , C.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , C.WEB_NOV_PUBLISHER , C.WEB_NOV_INFORM , C.WEB_NOV_IMG_LOCATION , C.DAY_OF_WEEK , C.WEB_NOV_IS_OPEN , C.FINISHED_OR_NOT FROM COIN_USE_HIS A JOIN WEB_NOV_INFO C ON (C.WEB_NOV_NUM = A.WEB_NOV_NUM) WHERE A.MEM_NUM = ? AND C.WEB_NOV_IS_OPEN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.COIN_USE_DATE DESC

UPDATE /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#updateMember() */ MEM_INFO A SET A.MEM_NAME = ? , A.MEM_PWD = ? , A.MEM_EMAIL = ? , A.MEM_ADDRESS = ? , A.MEM_BIRTHDATE = ? WHERE A.MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#deleteMember() */ MEM_INFO A SET A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN = 'Y' , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE A.MEM_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectWishlist() */ A.WEB_NOV_NUM , A.MEM_NUM , A.WISHLIST_DATE , B.CATEGORY_CODE , B.WEB_NOV_TITLE , B.WEB_NOV_AUTHOR , B.WEB_NOV_PUBLISHER , B.WEB_NOV_INFORM , B.WEB_NOV_IMG_LOCATION , B.DAY_OF_WEEK , B.WEB_NOV_IS_OPEN , B.FINISHED_OR_NOT FROM WISH_LIST A JOIN WEB_NOV_INFO B ON (B.WEB_NOV_NUM = A.WEB_NOV_NUM) WHERE A.MEM_NUM = ? AND B.WEB_NOV_IS_OPEN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.WISHLIST_DATE DESC
UPDATE /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#incrementLoginCount() */ MEM_INFO A SET A.MEM_LOGIN_COUNT = MEM_LOGIN_COUNT + 1 WHERE A.MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#incrementFreeCoin() */ MEM_INFO A SET A.MEM_COIN = A.MEM_COIN + 20 , A.MEM_WEEKLY_COIN_YN = 'N' WHERE A.MEM_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectMember() */ A.MEM_NUM , A.MEM_NAME , A.MEM_ID , A.MEM_PWD , A.MEM_EMAIL , A.MEM_ADDRESS , A.MEM_BIRTHDATE , A.MEM_LOGIN_COUNT , A.MEM_COIN , A.MEM_CAN_VOTE_YN , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_DATE , A.MEM_CLASS , A.MEM_BLOCK_YN , A.MEM_BLOCK_DATE , A.MEM_ENROLL_DATE , A.MEM_WEEKLY_COIN_YN FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN = 'N' AND A.MEM_NUM = ?
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectNoticeList() */ A.RNUM , A.NOTICE_NUM , A.NOTICE_DATE , A.NOTICE_NAME , A.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , A.NOTICE_CONTENT , A.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NUM , B.NOTICE_DATE , B.NOTICE_NAME , B.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , B.NOTICE_CONTENT , B.NOTICE_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.NOTICE_NUM , C.NOTICE_DATE , C.NOTICE_NAME , C.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , C.NOTICE_CONTENT , C.NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE C WHERE C.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NUM DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

UPDATE /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#incrementNoticeCount() */ NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT = (SELECT B.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT FROM NOTICE B WHERE B.NOTICE_NUM = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.NOTICE_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectNoticeDetail() */ A.NOTICE_NUM , A.NOTICE_DATE , A.NOTICE_NAME , A.NOTICE_VIEW_COUNT , A.NOTICE_CONTENT , A.NOTICE_STATUS FROM NOTICE A WHERE A.NOTICE_NUM = ?
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectFAQTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM FAQ A

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectFAQList() */ A.RNUM , A.POST_NUM , A.FAQ_POST_TITLE , A.FAQ_POST_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NUM , B.FAQ_POST_TITLE , B.FAQ_POST_CONTENT FROM (SELECT C.POST_NUM , C.FAQ_POST_TITLE , C.FAQ_POST_CONTENT FROM FAQ C ORDER BY C.POST_NUM DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectFaqDetail() */ A.POST_NUM , A.FAQ_POST_TITLE , A.FAQ_POST_CONTENT FROM FAQ A WHERE A.POST_NUM = ?
SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectQNATotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM QNA A WHERE MEM_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectQNAList() */ A.RNUM , A.POST_NUM , A.MEM_NAME , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_OPEN_YN , A.QNA_ANSWER_YN , A.QNA_DATE , A.QNA_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NUM , B.MEM_NAME , B.QNA_TITLE , B.QNA_OPEN_YN , B.QNA_ANSWER_YN , B.QNA_DATE , B.QNA_CONTENT FROM (SELECT C.POST_NUM , D.MEM_NAME , C.QNA_TITLE , C.QNA_OPEN_YN , C.QNA_ANSWER_YN , C.QNA_DATE , C.QNA_CONTENT FROM QNA C JOIN MEM_INFO D ON (D.MEM_NUM = C.MEM_NUM) WHERE C.MEM_NUM = ? ORDER BY C.POST_NUM DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectQnaDetail() */ C.POST_NUM , D.MEM_NAME , C.QNA_TITLE , C.QNA_OPEN_YN , C.QNA_ANSWER_YN , C.QNA_DATE , C.QNA_CONTENT FROM QNA C JOIN MEM_INFO D ON (D.MEM_NUM = C.MEM_NUM) WHERE C.MEM_NUM = ? AND C.POST_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectQnaReplyList() */ C.REPLY_NUM , C.POST_NUM , C.REPLY_DATE , D.MEM_NAME , C.REPLY_CONTENT FROM QNA_REPLY C JOIN MEM_INFO D ON (D.MEM_NUM = C.MEM_NUM) WHERE C.POST_NUM = ? ORDER BY C.REPLY_NUM DESC

INSERT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#insertQnaReply() */ INTO QNA_REPLY A ( A.REPLY_NUM , A.POST_NUM , A.REPLY_DATE , A.MEM_NUM , A.REPLY_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_QNA_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? )

INSERT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#insertQNA() */ INTO QNA A ( A.POST_NUM , A.MEM_NUM , A.QNA_TITLE , A.QNA_DATE , A.QNA_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_QNA_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? )

INSERT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#insertCoin() */ INTO COIN_CHARGE A ( A.COIN_CHARGE_NUM , A.MEM_NUM , A.COIN_CHARGE_DATE , A.COIN_CHARGE_COUNT , A.COIN_CHARGE_TOTAL , A.WEEKLY_COIN_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHARGE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , 'N' )

INSERT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#insertFreeCoin() */ INTO COIN_CHARGE A ( A.COIN_CHARGE_NUM , A.MEM_NUM , A.COIN_CHARGE_DATE , A.COIN_CHARGE_COUNT , A.COIN_CHARGE_TOTAL , A.WEEKLY_COIN_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHARGE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , SYSDATE , 20 , NULL , 'Y' )
UPDATE /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#updateCoinCharge() */ MEM_INFO A SET A.MEM_COIN = A.MEM_COIN + ? WHERE A.MEM_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectCoinCharge() */ A.COIN_CHARGE_NUM , A.MEM_NUM , A.COIN_CHARGE_DATE , A.COIN_CHARGE_COUNT , A.COIN_CHARGE_TOTAL , A.WEEKLY_COIN_YN FROM COIN_CHARGE A WHERE MEM_NUM = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#searchId() */ A.MEM_NUM , A.MEM_NAME , A.MEM_ID , A.MEM_PWD , A.MEM_EMAIL , A.MEM_ADDRESS , A.MEM_BIRTHDATE , A.MEM_LOGIN_COUNT , A.MEM_COIN , A.MEM_CAN_VOTE_YN , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_DATE , A.MEM_CLASS , A.MEM_BLOCK_YN , A.MEM_BLOCK_DATE , A.MEM_ENROLL_DATE , A.MEM_WEEKLY_COIN_YN FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN = 'N' AND A.MEM_NAME = ? AND A.MEM_EMAIL = ?

SELECT /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#searchPwd() */ A.MEM_NUM , A.MEM_NAME , A.MEM_ID , A.MEM_PWD , A.MEM_EMAIL , A.MEM_ADDRESS , A.MEM_BIRTHDATE , A.MEM_LOGIN_COUNT , A.MEM_COIN , A.MEM_CAN_VOTE_YN , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN , A.MEM_WITHDRAW_DATE , A.MEM_CLASS , A.MEM_BLOCK_YN , A.MEM_BLOCK_DATE , A.MEM_ENROLL_DATE , A.MEM_WEEKLY_COIN_YN FROM MEM_INFO A WHERE A.MEM_WITHDRAW_YN = 'N' AND A.MEM_NAME = ? AND A.MEM_ID = ? AND A.MEM_EMAIL = ?
UPDATE /* com.lastbug.firstbook.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#updatePassword() */ MEM_INFO A SET A.MEM_PWD = ? WHERE A.MEM_ID =?
